teamcheckbox: TEAM - who is taking online appointments for this service
Howwould: How would you like to sell this service?
Unticking: Unticking this checkbox means that your clients will not be   able to book the service online.It would still be listed in   packages, as their online distribution settings are not   affected by this change.
ServiceText: A service is one treatment per booking – nice and simple.
packageText: A few services that can be booked together, typically provided by different team members.
MenuGroupText: Menu groups are great for categorizing services and could make it easier for clients to find what they’re looking for.
Alertbox: Discounts will only apply for bookings made through Bakim Randevu and the Booking Widget. If multiple discounts apply, only the largest will be applied. Note that it may take up to an hour to show discounts in the browse results page once enabled.
AddVoucherSubText: Add a voucher to be used when checking out. Unit price should be the regular selling price.

Acceptbookings: Accept bookings from your website and other sites
Othersites: Accept bookings from your website and other sites Allow your customers to make bookings directly from your website or via the link. Take bookings while you sleep your booking widget.
Madevia: Bookings made via the online booking widget may include a processing fee (plus VAT) depending on the type of contract. This fee includes a booking button, a booking widget on your website, email notifications and SMS reminders to your customers.
Bookingbuttonyour: Test your booking button and check the settings you can make.
Installthe: Copy the code into your website to install the booking button. Customers can then view and book your offer.
CopyCodebutton: Click the Copy Code button to cache the HTML code.
Pastethecopied: Paste the copied HTML code into your website.
Booknowwidget: To install the Book Now widget on your Facebook and Instagram pages.
Copythecodebelow: Copy the code below, paste it into your website to allow customers to view your price list and book instantly - without ever leaving your website.
Ownbookingwidget: You now have your own booking widget link. Copy the link and share it on your website, social media, email marketing and with your signature. Anywhere you want.
Upgrade: You are about to upgrade your membership
Yournewmembership: Your new membership plan will take effect immediately and will renew on May 26, 2021
Filtercustomers: Filter customers by number of bookings :
Preciselyyouaddress: The more precisely you address your customers, the more successful your customer emails will be. In order to determine the exact circle of recipients, you can make filter settings in the top right of your customer list.
Rescheduleremove: Reschedule or remove upcoming booking of this client, then you can delete this client.
Promotionalemails: Do not wish to receive promotional emails.
Editthesettings: Edit the settings for your bookings, your calendar and your discounts.
Ptext: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like).

PHow: How the Site, Application & Services Work
WinbackyourtimewithAuomatedmessaging: Win back your time with Auomated messaging
Wintext: Automate client communications and we'll send them perfectly-timed, professionally-designed emails and messages - without you having to lift a finger. Just enter their details in Connect, and we'll do the rest.
Wintexttwo: More time on your team's hands, better salon experience for your  clients.
Sendthemathankyounote: Send them a thank you note
SendthemathankyounoteSubtext: Make your clients want to come back with a 'Thank you' email sent after their appointment (a small gesture that can go a long way).
InviteclientstobookagainSubtext: When the time is right, Connect will send them an email or SMS inviting them to rebook, helping you get more repeats. How it works
SendabirthdaymessageSubtext: Make your clients want to come back with a 'Thank you' email sent after their appointment (a small gesture that can go a long way).
KeepclientsuptodateSubtext: When the time is right, Connect will send them an email or SMS inviting them to rebook, helping you get more repeats. How it works
SendhelpfullappointmentreminderSubtext: When the time is right, Connect will send them an email or SMS inviting them to rebook, helping you get more repeats. How it works
askforverifyviewersSubtext: Make your clients want to come back with a 'Thank you' email sent after their appointment (a small gesture that can go a long way).
FacebookAndIntagramSubtext: Turn your Facebook and Instagram followers into clients. Commission-free.
FacebookAndIntagramSubtextNew: Link Connect to your business social media profiles and get booked straight through your Facebook and Instagram in seconds, without paying commission.
SocialFacebookSub: With a Book Now button on your business page and posts.
SocialInstagramSub: Via a Book Now button instantly visible to anyone who visits your profile.
PartnerSiteSubtext: With Bakim Randevu Connect you can enable a customisable website for your salon. We take care of security, hosting, optimising it for search engines and making sure it looks and works on devices of all sizes.
PartnerSiteSubtextSecond: This website is built with the content you already have. Your customers will see your team members and their bios, the same menu that is visible on Bakim Randevu, description, contact details and even your best reviews.
SocialLinksSubText: Partner site can display links to your social media accounts. Fill in the addresses below to have them enabled.
Fillemail: Fill customer details for send an email
Fillclient: Fill client details for send an email
Showprofilephoto: Show profile photo in email header (The main image is displayed.)
MarketingCommunicationSubText: I confirm that i have obtaned specific, informed, freely given  and active consent from this customer to recive invites to  rebook and other marketing emails and SMS from my salon and   have a record of this consent.
Prepaymentrequiredsubtext: Requires clients to pay in advance when booking online with your salon. This does not apply to bookings made via 'Reserve with Google'.
Addaproducttobe: Add a product to be used when checking out. Unit price should be the regular selling price.
Alwaysmakesure: Always make sure you cheak out appointment to get the most out of reports. read more
Youmustenter: You must enter all your clients’ contact details in Connect for this report to be accurate - clients without a phone number or email address will be missing from the data.
Thereturningrate: The returning rate measures the percentage of your customers who come back for another appointment. A 0% rate means every customer who comes into your salon that month is new, while a 100% rate means every customer is returning. On average, 52% of clients are returning, according to our salons. Learn more
BookingSubText: Make your clients want to come back with a 'Thank you' email sent after their appointment (a small gesture that can go a long way).
SalesSubText: Analyse your salon’s sales performance across channels, employees and more: from checked out appointments to sold hair and beauty products, know your business sales back to front.
ClientsSubText: Know how your salon is performing client-wise with insights into how many first-time visitors, returning clients and total customers you get over a selected period of time.
Choosefrom: Choose from 212 venues offering hairdressers and hair salons in London
Wehaventfound: We haven't found any venues matching your search criteria
Trychanging: Try changing your location or editing your treatment categories.
Notwhatyou: Not what you were looking for?
Someoftheseservices: Some of these services contain Off peak discounts
